Action: # Autocheck: Autocheck
autocheck/autocheck
## Preparation

Activate the testdrive setup for this test suite, by using the following url

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//testdrive/autocheck

Expected Test Results: You receive the testdrive setup details, including an admin account for you to use, and an application and journal which have been autochecked for testing

Action:
Log into DOAJ using the admin credentials supplied by the testdrive.  You may want to do this in a private browsing window, so you can remain logged in to your own account in your main window.

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com//account/login

Expected Test Results: You are logged in as an admin user

Action: You may now proceed to the tests below
## Application autochecks
Go to the Application admin_url supplied by the testdrive setup

Expected Test Results: You are looking at a test Application created for this test

Action: Scroll down to find the ISSN (print) and ISSN (online) fields

Expected Test Results: The Print ISSN field is annotated with a green tick, and text which says that ISSN is fully registered at ISSN.org
The Electronic ISSN field is annotated with an orange cross, which says the ISSN is not registered at ISSN.org

Action: Click on one of the "see record" links in the annotation

Expected Test Results: The link is opened in a new window/tab
You are taken to the ISSN.org record.  Note that for the purposes of this test, this is a random record on ISSN.org, unrelated to the actual record in DOAJ.

Action: Close the ISSN.org window/tab and return to the application form
Scroll to the "Best Practice" section of the application form, and look at the "Long-term preservation services" question

Expected Test Results: 5 checks are visible attached to this question, for: CLOCKSS, LOCKSS, Internet Archive, PMC and PKP PN
CLOCKSS is annotated with a red exclamation, saying it is archived but not selected in the form
LOCKSS is annotated with a green tick, saying it is currently archived
Internet Archiive is annotated with a red cross, saying it is archived but not current
PKP PN is annotated with a red cross, saying it is not archived
PMC is annotated with a grey info symbol, saying it is not currently recorded by Keepers

Action: Click on one of the "see record" links in the annotation

Expected Test Results: The link is opened in a new window/tab
You are taken to the ISSN.org record.  Note that for the purposes of this test, this is a random record on ISSN.org, unrelated to the actual record in DOAJ.

Action: Close the ISSN.org window/tab and return to the application form
Scroll to the top of the application form

Expected Test Results: There is text which tells you when the Autochecks were made, and an option to Hide All Autochecks

Action: Click "Hide All Autochecks", then scroll through the form

Expected Test Results: The autochecks are all hidden

Action: Return to the top of the application form and click "Show All Autochecks", then scroll through the form

Expected Test Results: The autochecks are all visible again

Action: ## Journal autochecks
Go to the Journal admin_url supplied by the testdrive setup

Expected Test Results: You are looking at a test Journal created for this test

Action: Scroll down to find the ISSN (print) and ISSN (online) fields

Expected Test Results: The Print ISSN field is annotated with a green tick, and text which says that ISSN is fully registered at ISSN.org
The Electronic ISSN field is annotated with an red cross, which says the ISSN is not found at ISSN.org

Action: Click on one of the "see record" links in the annotation

Expected Test Results: The link is opened in a new window/tab
You are taken to the ISSN.org record.  Note that for the purposes of this test, this is a random record on ISSN.org, unrelated to the actual record in DOAJ.

Action: Close the ISSN.org window/tab and return to the journal form
Scroll to the "Best Practice" section of the application form, and look at the "Long-term preservation services" question

Expected Test Results: 5 checks are visible attached to this question, for: CLOCKSS, LOCKSS, Internet Archive, PMC and PKP PN
CLOCKSS is annotated with a red exclamation, saying it is archived but not selected in the form
LOCKSS is annotated with a green tick, saying it is currently archived
Internet Archiive is annotated with a red cross, saying it is archived but not current
PKP PN is annotated with a red cross, saying it is not archived
PMC is annotated with a grey info symbol, saying it is not currently recorded by Keepers

Action: Click on one of the "see record" links in the annotation

Expected Test Results: The link is opened in a new window/tab
You are taken to the ISSN.org record.  Note that for the purposes of this test, this is a random record on ISSN.org, unrelated to the actual record in DOAJ.

Action: Close the ISSN.org window/tab and return to the journal form
Scroll to the top of the journal form

Expected Test Results: There is text which tells you when the Autochecks were made, and an option to Hide All Autochecks

Action: Click "Hide All Autochecks", then scroll through the form

Expected Test Results: The autochecks are all hidden

Action: Return to the top of the journal form and click "Show All Autochecks", then scroll through the form

Expected Test Results: The autochecks are all visible again

Action: ## Teardown
Close your private browsing window you used for the test
Click the "Teardown" url supplied by the testdrive setup

Expected Test Results: You receive a success notification in your browser window

Action: You can now close the testdrive browser tab/window
